original_title: Madagascar, or, Caroline Kennedy's Sinful Life in London
overview: "This is a short film based on an incident I read in the National Enquirer, a really innocuous item about Caroline partying late at night with Erskine Guinness, the heir to the Guinness Brewery fortune. I imagined Caroline waking up the next morning, recovering from the excesses of the night before, and trying to mix some orange juice in a blender, but being so out of it that she used three cans of gin instead of water to make the concentrate into OJ. Itâ€™s an odd film; runs about 1:30." - Wheeler Winston Dixon
title: Madagascar, or, Caroline Kennedy's Sinful Life in London
